title: Bill Announcement – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Law & Justice	

Issued on:
January 12, 2021
On Tuesday, January 12, 2021, the President signed into law:S. 4996, the “Bankruptcy Administration Improvement Act of 2020,” which establishes a Chapter 7 Trustee Fund to make additional payments to bankruptcy trustees and extends certain temporary bankruptcy judgeships.
